info.title: SeminarDesk Public API (unreleased next version)
info.description: Provides information about events, dates and prices, allows creation of bookings as well as access to booker online accounts.

tenantId.description: Unique tenant ID assigned to each customer by SeminarDesk

get.summary: Retrieve general information about the tenant like name, logo, available salutations, labels etc.

200.description: Successful response - contains information about tenant

get.summary: Retrieve list of all upcoming, published event dates

200.description: Successful response - contains list of event dates including some details of the events they belong to

get.summary: Retrieve list of all upcoming, published event dates

200.description: Successful response - contains list of event dates including some details of the events they belong to

get.summary: Retrieve list of all past, published event dates

200.description: Successful response - contains list of event dates including some details of the events they belong to

get.summary: Retrieve information about a single event

200.description: Successful response - contains all details about a single event

post.summary: Retrieve calculated price summary for one or more event dates and one or more guests

200.description: Successful response - contains price details for each event date and guest

400.description: Error response - price query invalid, maybe invalid voucher code was provided

post.summary: Retrieve calculated prices for one event date and one guest

200.description: Successful response - contains price details for different items

400.description: Error response - price query invalid, maybe invalid voucher code was provided

post.summary: Create a new booking with the provided details

400.description: Error response - booking could not be created. See `message` for details.

201.description: Account was created. A confirmation email was sent to the provided email address. **Note**: Due to security reasons, this will always return an account ID, even if the given email address was already registered.

200.description: Profile data

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

put.description: *Note*: The profile's email address cannot be changed.

200.description: Update successful

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid
Authentication token was missing or invalid

200.description: 2FA enabled successfully, list of recovery codes is returned

400.description: Bad request, e.g. 2FA is not available or secret or code were missing or invalid

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

delete.summary: Disable 2FA for this account. Existing recovery codes will be deleted

400.description: Bad request, e.g. 2FA is not available

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid
Authentication token was missing or invalid

post.summary: Request the deletion of the account
post.description: The current password has to be sent in the request body.

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid
Authentication token was missing or invalid

post.summary: Upload a file to the account
post.description: Allowed file types: PDF, PNG, JPEG.  Maximum size per file: 10 MB.

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

200.description: File's binary contents

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid
Authentication token was missing or invalid

get.summary: Retrieve the list of inbox files

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

200.description: Inbox file's binary contents

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

get.summary: Retrieve the list of documents related to event dates

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

200.description: Dcoument's binary contents

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

200.description: List of bookings

403.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

post.summary: Authenticate via the given email and password
post.description: Returns "current user" information including authentication token and profile.

200.description: Authentication successful

401.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

200.description: Authentication successful

400.description: Authentication unsuccessful, token or 2FA code invalid/expired

post.summary: Trigger a "reset password" request for the given email address

202.description: Password reset request was successfully created. If there was a user account with the given email address, a confirmation email was sent to this address

put.summary: Set the password for the account that is related to the given reset token

get.summary: Check whether the given account confirmation token is valid

200.description: Token is valid. See payload for account status
Successful response - contains list of facilitators
Successful response - contains details about facilitator

get.summary: Retrieve event dates related to the facilitator

200.description: Successful response - contains list of event dates related to the facilitator

dates.description: Contains the array of upcoming event dates including some details of the event the dates belong to

priceLevelId.description: The ID of the price level

order.description: Order based on the natural order of this event's dates and the order of their facilitator assignments

externalIdentifier.description: Some arbitrary external identifier for this booking

dateOfBirth.description: Guest's date of birth in format YYYY-MM-DD

guestTypeId.description: ID of the guest type. If not provided, the first guest type of logical type "participant" will be used

attendanceType.description: If event date allows attendance type selection, it can be set to either "online" or "on-site"

availablePrefixes.description: List of salutation options that can be used for guests.

availableTitles.description: List of available (academic) titles, e.g. "Dr.", "PhD" etc. that can be used for guests.

value.description: The text in the given language

token.description: Temporary token that can be used to complete 2FA login
The temporary token that was returned during login

confirmationUrl.description: Note: The API will replace the string `{token}` with the confirmation token

passwordUrl.description: Note: The API will replace the string `{token}` with the reset token

backupCodes.description: List of 10 single use verification codes

GetListResponseMeta.description: Provides some meta information about the response

data.description: Contains the list of event dates related to this facilitator

firstPage.description: Link to the first page of this list

lastPage.description: Link to the last page of this list

nextPage.description: Link to the next page of this list  or null if it is already the last one

previousPage.description: Link to the previous page of this list  or null if it is already the first one

UnauthorizedError.description: Authentication token was missing or invalid

bearerAuth.description: Authentication token provided after successful login
